text.content:
flowchart LR
    classDef user fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef merchant fill:#ffcc99,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef gateway fill:#99ccff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef infra fill:#ccffcc,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef service fill:#ffff99,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef regulator fill:#ff9999,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef action fill:#fff,stroke:#000,stroke-width:1.5px,stroke-dasharray: 5 5;

    P["👤 Payer"]:::user --> ISS["💳 Issuer"]:::infra
    P --> M["🛍️ Merchant"]:::merchant

    ISS --> A3(["Action: Raise Dispute"]):::action
    A3 --> CN["🌐 Network"]:::infra
    CN --> ACQ["🏦 Acquirer"]:::infra
    ACQ --> M

    ISS --> FNR["🕵️ F&R Engine"]:::service
    CN --> CS["💱 Clearing & Settlement"]:::infra

    CS --> ISS
    CS --> ACQ
    CS --> M

    ISS -.-> LOG["📜 Logging Service"]:::service
    CN -.-> LOG
    ACQ -.-> LOG
    LOG -.-> REG["⚖️ Regulator"]:::regulator
    LOG -.-> NOTI["📢 Notification Service"]:::service
    NOTI -.-> P
    NOTI -.-> M

rich_text.plain_text:
flowchart LR
    classDef user fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef merchant fill:#ffcc99,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef gateway fill:#99ccff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;

    classDef regulator fill:#ff9999,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
    classDef action fill:#fff,stroke:#000,stroke-width:1.5px,stroke-dasharray: 5 5;

    P["👤 Payer"]:::user --> ISS["💳 Issuer"]:::infra
    P --> M["🛍️ Merchant"]:::merchant

    ISS --> A3(["Action: Raise Dispute"]):::action
    A3 --> CN["🌐 Network"]:::infra
    CN --> ACQ["🏦 Acquirer"]:::infra
    ACQ --> M

    ISS --> FNR["🕵️ F&R Engine"]:::service
    CN --> CS["💱 Clearing & Settlement"]:::infra

    CS --> ISS

    CS --> M

    ISS -.-> LOG["📜 Logging Service"]:::service

    LOG -.-> REG["⚖️ Regulator"]:::regulator
    LOG -.-> NOTI["📢 Notification Service"]:::service
